JustCall Settings Helper

Use this page when the tray icon is missing but the app is running.

Instructions:

  1. Make sure JustCall is running (hotkeys should work)
  2. Click "Open Settings Window" above
  3. The settings window should appear
  4. Use "Import Code" to add a target with your partner's code

Manual Settings Location:

~/Library/Application Support/justcall/settings.json

Testing Cross-Device Calls:

  1. Device A: Create a target, copy the code
  2. Device B: Click Import Code, paste the code
  3. Both devices: Press your join hotkeys
  4. You'll be in the same video call!
